reviewText: Upon the recomendation of my friend, I watched a screener he had the other day. I was reluctant due to the fact I've never seen a direct to video horror movie that had any redeeming qualities. This film suprised me, it's a unique film from the zomvies point of view. Also has a, strange love story if you can imagine that.... highly recomended.

Watched a screener of the film the other night. Good stuff, although rough around the edges. This really is a movie from the monster's point of view. If you want a horror film with more then blood and guts, then you will enjoy this.
